item.title: Starting rust programming on Emacs
item.author: pablo.palazon@gmail.com (Pablo Palazon)
item.description: cargo install racer rustup component add rust-src rustup component add rustfmt-preview Enable rust module in prelude in ~/.emacs.d/prelude-modules.el Use cargo Emacs commands: Emacs minor mode for Cargo
